PropertySetDef.Name: Pset_ValvePHistory
PropertySetDef.Definition: Valve performance history common attributes of a typical 2 port pattern type valve.

PropertyDef.Name: MeasuredFlowRate
PropertyDef.Definition: The rate of flow of a fluid measured across the valve.

PropertyDef.Name: MeasuredPressureDrop
PropertyDef.Definition: The actual pressure drop in the fluid measured across the valve.

PropertyDef.Name: PercentageOpen
PropertyDef.Definition: The ratio between the amount that the valve is open to the full open position of the valve.
